code: export var REQUEST_ITEMS="REQUEST_ITEMS";export var RECEIVE_ITEMS="RECEIVE_ITEMS";export var CHANGE_SELECTION="CHANGE_SELECTION";function requestItems(startDate,endDate){return{type:REQUEST_ITEMS,startDate:startDate,endDate:endDate};}export function changeSelection(selectedItemId){return{type:CHANGE_SELECTION,selectedItemId:selectedItemId};}var receiveItems=function receiveItems(data){return{type:RECEIVE_ITEMS,items:data};};export function fetchItems(startDate,endDate){return function(dispatch){dispatch(requestItems(startDate,endDate));return fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/Item/availableItems?From=".concat(startDate.format("MM-DD-YYYY"),"&To=").concat(endDate.format("MM-DD-YYYY"))).then(function(response){return response.json();},function(error){return console.log("An error occurred.",error);}).then(function(json){return dispatch(receiveItems(json));});};}
